data.name: XTableUIProvider
desc: is used by the database application to obtain non-default user interface information and/or components for database tables.

methods.name: getTableEditor
desc: returns a component which can be used to edit the definition of an existing table.

methods.name: getTableIcon
desc: provides the icon which should be used to represent the table in the database application window.
The icon will usually be requested once per table, and cached. It might be requested again if the application settings change, for instance, if another desktop theme has been activated.
